com.brightcove.player.event
Interface Component

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponent, AdCuePointComponent, Analytics, BrightcovePluginManager, BrightcoveVideoView, Catalog, DefaultSourceSelectionController, FindVideoTask, FreeWheelController, GoogleIMAComponent, LoadImageTask, MediaService, OmnitureComponent, SeamlessSourceSelectionController, SeamlessVideoDisplayComponent, SeamlessVideoView, VideoDisplayComponent, VideoPlaybackController, VideoStillDisplayComponent, WidevinePlugin
@Emits(events={"sample","event","list"})
@ListensFor(events={"play","stop"})
public interface Component

Classes that implement this interface will be designed to work with the EventEmitter System Classes that implement this interface should use the Emits and ListensFor annotations
